channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (25 May 2016)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 25 May 2016.

item.title: 1 IDR = 0.043029 XAF
